# usePreviewDevice (hook)

## Import

```typescript
import { usePreviewDevice } from '@livekit/components-react';
```

| Parameter | Type                         | Description |
| --------- | ---------------------------- | ----------- |

| deviceId  | string                       |             |
| kind      | 'videoinput' \| 'audioinput' |             |

**Returns:**
